short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tabs cleanup tool - keeping you focused on what you really want with a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Cop lets you manage your tab clutter with ease -
Keeping you focused and productive, without becoming a tab manager yourself.

Alt+A : Mark a site to be closed later.
Alt+X : Close all the sites you've marked.
Alt+C : Close all other tabs for the current site, keep just one.

Simple as that.

Got feedback or a feature request? found a bug? I'd love to hear it!

https://github.com/ron-b/TabCop-Feedback/issues/new
